title: iMac 820-3478-A
message:
Happy new year to all 

i have iMac 27? no back light I can see the Apple logo when powered on. On u8200 chip there is voltage coming in on pin  but no led driver en on pin 10

any advise please 

many thanks

title: iMac 820-3478-A
message:
Did you try another screen?
Check voltage and resistance to ground at BLC_VOUT1/2, with screen connected of course.

title: iMac 820-3478-A
message: Cheers man got it all sorted

title: iMac 820-3478-A
message:
Glad to hear that.
Please, let a feedback about the issue, it can help someone else...

title: iMac 820-3478-A
message: Hi the problem was at u4402 and R4404  input on that chip was there but no output changed them and the backlight came on.
